After<S>3326</S> this<S>5023</S> there was<S>2258</S> a feast<S>1859</S> of the Jews<S>2453</S>; and<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> went up<S>305</S> to<S>1519</S> Jerusalem<S>2414</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> there is<S>2076</S> at<S>1722</S> Jerusalem<S>2414</S> by<S>1909</S> the sheep<S>4262</S> market a pool<S>2861</S>, which<S>3588</S> is called<S>1951</S> in the Hebrew tongue<S>1447</S> Bethesda<S>964</S>, having<S>2192</S> five<S>4002</S> porches<S>4745</S>. <sup>market: or, gate</sup>
In<S>1722</S> these<S>5025</S> lay<S>2621</S> a great<S>4183</S> multitude<S>4128</S> of impotent folk<S>770</S>, of blind<S>5185</S>, halt<S>5560</S>, withered<S>3584</S>, waiting for<S>1551</S> the moving<S>2796</S> of the water<S>5204</S>.
For<S>1063</S> an angel<S>32</S> went down<S>2597</S> at<S>2596</S> a certain season<S>2540</S> into<S>1722</S> the pool<S>2861</S>, and<S>2532</S> troubled<S>5015</S> the water<S>5204</S>: whosoever then<S>3767</S> first<S>4413</S> after<S>3326</S> the troubling<S>5016</S> of the water<S>5204</S> stepped in<S>1684</S> was made<S>1096</S> whole<S>5199</S> of<S>3739</S> whatsoever<S>1221</S> disease<S>3553</S> he had<S>2722</S>.
And<S>1161</S> a certain<S>5100</S> man<S>444</S> was<S>2258</S> there<S>1563</S>, which had<S>2192</S> an infirmity<S>1722</S> <S>769</S> thirty<S>5144</S> and eight<S>3638</S> years<S>2094</S>.
When Jesus<S>2424</S> saw<S>1492</S> him<S>5126</S> lie<S>2621</S>, and<S>2532</S> knew<S>1097</S> that<S>3754</S> he had been<S>2192</S> now<S>2235</S> a long<S>4183</S> time<S>5550</S> in that case, he saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Wilt thou<S>2309</S> be made<S>1096</S> whole<S>5199</S>?
The impotent man<S>770</S> answered<S>611</S> him<S>846</S>, Sir<S>2962</S>, I have<S>2192</S> no<S>3756</S> man<S>444</S>, when<S>3752</S> the water<S>5204</S> is troubled<S>5015</S>, to<S>2443</S> put<S>906</S> me<S>3165</S> into<S>1519</S> the pool<S>2861</S>: but<S>1161</S> while<S>1722</S> <S>3739</S> I<S>1473</S> am coming<S>2064</S>, another<S>243</S> steppeth down<S>2597</S> before<S>4253</S> me<S>1700</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Rise<S>1453</S>, take up<S>142</S> thy<S>4675</S> bed<S>2895</S>, and<S>2532</S> walk<S>4043</S>.
And<S>2532</S> immediately<S>2112</S> the man<S>444</S> was made<S>1096</S> whole<S>5199</S>, and<S>2532</S> took up<S>142</S> his<S>846</S> bed<S>2895</S>, and<S>2532</S> walked<S>4043</S>: and<S>1161</S> on<S>1722</S> the same<S>1565</S> day<S>2250</S> was<S>2258</S> the sabbath<S>4521</S>.
The Jews<S>2453</S> therefore<S>3767</S> said<S>3004</S> unto him that was cured<S>2323</S>, It is<S>2076</S> the sabbath day<S>4521</S>: it is<S>1832</S> not<S>3756</S> lawful<S>1832</S> for thee<S>4671</S> to carry<S>142</S> thy bed<S>2895</S>.
He answered<S>611</S> them<S>846</S>, He that made<S>4160</S> me<S>3165</S> whole<S>5199</S>, the same<S>1565</S> said<S>2036</S> unto me<S>3427</S>, Take up<S>142</S> thy<S>4675</S> bed<S>2895</S>, and<S>2532</S> walk<S>4043</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> asked they<S>2065</S> him<S>846</S>, What<S>5101</S> man<S>444</S> is<S>2076</S> that which<S>3588</S> said<S>2036</S> unto thee<S>4671</S>, Take up<S>142</S> thy<S>4675</S> bed<S>2895</S>, and<S>2532</S> walk<S>4043</S>?
And<S>1161</S> he that was healed<S>2390</S> wist<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> who<S>5101</S> it was<S>2076</S>: for<S>1063</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> had conveyed himself away<S>1593</S>, a multitude<S>3793</S> being<S>5607</S> in<S>1722</S> that place<S>5117</S>. <sup>a multitude: or, from the multitude that was</sup>
Afterward<S>3326</S> <S>5023</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> findeth<S>2147</S> him<S>846</S> in<S>1722</S> the temple<S>2411</S>, and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Behold<S>2396</S>, thou art made<S>1096</S> whole<S>5199</S>: sin<S>264</S> no more<S>3371</S>, lest<S>3363</S> a worse thing<S>5501</S> <S>5100</S> come<S>1096</S> unto thee<S>4671</S>.
The man<S>444</S> departed<S>565</S>, and<S>2532</S> told<S>312</S> the Jews<S>2453</S> that<S>3754</S> it was<S>2076</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>, which<S>3588</S> had made<S>4160</S> him<S>846</S> whole<S>5199</S>.
And<S>2532</S> therefore<S>1223</S> <S>5124</S> did<S>1377</S> the Jews<S>2453</S> persecute<S>1377</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>, and<S>2532</S> sought<S>2212</S> to slay<S>615</S> him<S>846</S>, because<S>3754</S> he had done<S>4160</S> these things<S>5023</S> on<S>1722</S> the sabbath day<S>4521</S>.
But<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> them<S>846</S>, My<S>3450</S> Father<S>3962</S> worketh<S>2038</S> hitherto<S>2193</S> <S>737</S>, and I<S>2504</S> work<S>2038</S>.
Therefore<S>1223</S> <S>5124</S> <S>3767</S> the Jews<S>2453</S> sought<S>2212</S> the more<S>3123</S> to kill<S>615</S> him<S>846</S>, because<S>3754</S> he<S>3089</S> not<S>3756</S> only<S>3440</S> had broken<S>3089</S> the sabbath<S>4521</S>, but<S>235</S> said<S>3004</S> also<S>2532</S> that God<S>2316</S> was his<S>2398</S> Father<S>3962</S>, making<S>4160</S> himself<S>1438</S> equal<S>2470</S> with God<S>2316</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> answered<S>611</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Verily<S>281</S>, verily<S>281</S>, I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, The Son<S>5207</S> can<S>1410</S> <S>3756</S> do<S>4160</S> nothing<S>3762</S> of<S>575</S> himself<S>1438</S>, but<S>3362</S> what<S>5100</S> he seeth<S>991</S> the Father<S>3962</S> do<S>4160</S>: for<S>1063</S> what things soever<S>3739</S> <S>302</S> he<S>1565</S> doeth<S>4160</S>, these<S>5023</S> also<S>2532</S> doeth<S>4160</S> the Son<S>5207</S> likewise<S>3668</S>.
For<S>1063</S> the Father<S>3962</S> loveth<S>5368</S> the Son<S>5207</S>, and<S>2532</S> sheweth<S>1166</S> him<S>846</S> all things<S>3956</S> that<S>3739</S> himself<S>846</S> doeth<S>4160</S>: and<S>2532</S> he will shew<S>1166</S> him<S>846</S> greater<S>3187</S> works<S>2041</S> than<S>3187</S> these<S>5130</S>, that<S>2443</S> ye<S>5210</S> may marvel<S>2296</S>.
For<S>1063</S> as<S>5618</S> the Father<S>3962</S> raiseth up<S>1453</S> the dead<S>3498</S>, and<S>2532</S> quickeneth<S>2227</S> them; even<S>2532</S> so<S>3779</S> the Son<S>5207</S> quickeneth<S>2227</S> whom<S>3739</S> he will<S>2309</S>.
For<S>1063</S> <S>3761</S> the Father<S>3962</S> judgeth<S>2919</S> no man<S>3762</S>, but<S>235</S> hath committed<S>1325</S> all<S>3956</S> judgment<S>2920</S> unto the Son<S>5207</S>:
That<S>2443</S> all<S>3956</S> men should honour<S>5091</S> the Son<S>5207</S>, even as<S>2531</S> they honour<S>5091</S> the Father<S>3962</S>. He that honoureth<S>5091</S> not<S>3361</S> the Son<S>5207</S> honoureth<S>5091</S> not<S>3756</S> the Father<S>3962</S> which<S>3588</S> hath sent<S>3992</S> him<S>846</S>.
Verily<S>281</S>, verily<S>281</S>, I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>,<S>3754</S> He that heareth<S>191</S> my<S>3450</S> word<S>3056</S>, and<S>2532</S> believeth<S>4100</S> on him that sent<S>3992</S> me<S>3165</S>, hath<S>2192</S> everlasting<S>166</S> life<S>2222</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall<S>2064</S> not<S>3756</S> come<S>2064</S> into<S>1519</S> condemnation<S>2920</S>; but<S>235</S> is passed<S>3327</S> from<S>1537</S> death<S>2288</S> unto<S>1519</S> life<S>2222</S>.
Verily<S>281</S>, verily<S>281</S>, I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>,<S>3754</S> The hour<S>5610</S> is coming<S>2064</S>, and<S>2532</S> now<S>3568</S> is<S>2076</S>, when<S>3753</S> the dead<S>3498</S> shall hear<S>191</S> the voice<S>5456</S> of the Son<S>5207</S> of God<S>2316</S>: and<S>2532</S> they that hear<S>191</S> shall live<S>2198</S>.
For<S>1063</S> as<S>5618</S> the Father<S>3962</S> hath<S>2192</S> life<S>2222</S> in<S>1722</S> himself<S>1438</S>; so<S>2532</S> <S>3779</S> hath he given<S>1325</S> to the Son<S>5207</S> to have<S>2192</S> life<S>2222</S> in<S>1722</S> himself<S>1438</S>;
And<S>2532</S> hath given<S>1325</S> him<S>846</S> authority<S>1849</S> to execute<S>4160</S> judgment<S>2920</S> also<S>2532</S>, because<S>3754</S> he is<S>2076</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S>.
Marvel<S>2296</S> not<S>3361</S> at this<S>5124</S>: for<S>3754</S> the hour<S>5610</S> is coming<S>2064</S>, in<S>1722</S> the which<S>3739</S> all<S>3956</S> that are in<S>1722</S> the graves<S>3419</S> shall hear<S>191</S> his<S>846</S> voice<S>5456</S>,
And<S>2532</S> shall come forth<S>1607</S>; they that have done<S>4160</S> good<S>18</S>, unto<S>1519</S> the resurrection<S>386</S> of life<S>2222</S>; and<S>1161</S> they that have done<S>4238</S> evil<S>5337</S>, unto<S>1519</S> the resurrection<S>386</S> of damnation<S>2920</S>.
I<S>1473</S> can<S>1410</S> of<S>575</S> mine own self<S>1683</S> do<S>4160</S> nothing<S>3756</S> <S>3762</S>: as<S>2531</S> I hear<S>191</S>, I judge<S>2919</S>: and<S>2532</S> my<S>1699</S> judgment<S>2920</S> is<S>2076</S> just<S>1342</S>; because<S>3754</S> I seek<S>2212</S> not<S>3756</S> mine own<S>1699</S> will<S>2307</S>, but<S>235</S> the will<S>2307</S> of the Father<S>3962</S> which hath sent<S>3992</S> me<S>3165</S>.
If<S>1437</S> I<S>1473</S> bear witness<S>3140</S> of<S>4012</S> myself<S>1683</S>, my<S>3450</S> witness<S>3141</S> is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> true<S>227</S>.
There is<S>2076</S> another<S>243</S> that beareth witness<S>3140</S> of<S>4012</S> me<S>1700</S>; and<S>2532</S> I know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> the witness<S>3141</S> which<S>3739</S> he witnesseth<S>3140</S> of<S>4012</S> me<S>1700</S> is<S>2076</S> true<S>227</S>.
Ye<S>5210</S> sent<S>649</S> unto<S>4314</S> John<S>2491</S>, and<S>2532</S> he bare witness<S>3140</S> unto the truth<S>225</S>.
But<S>1161</S> I<S>1473</S> receive<S>2983</S> not<S>3756</S> testimony<S>3141</S> from<S>3844</S> man<S>444</S>: but<S>235</S> these things<S>5023</S> I say<S>3004</S>, that<S>2443</S> ye<S>5210</S> might be saved<S>4982</S>.
He<S>1565</S> was<S>2258</S> a burning<S>2545</S> and<S>2532</S> a shining<S>5316</S> light<S>3088</S>: and<S>1161</S> ye<S>5210</S> were willing<S>2309</S> for<S>4314</S> a season<S>5610</S> to rejoice<S>21</S> in<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> light<S>5457</S>.
But<S>1161</S> I<S>1473</S> have<S>2192</S> greater<S>3187</S> witness<S>3141</S> than that of John<S>2491</S>: for<S>1063</S> the works<S>2041</S> which<S>3739</S> the Father<S>3962</S> hath given<S>1325</S> me<S>3427</S> to<S>2443</S> finish<S>5048</S> <S>846</S>, the same<S>846</S> works<S>2041</S> that<S>3739</S> I<S>1473</S> do<S>4160</S>, bear witness<S>3140</S> of<S>4012</S> me<S>1700</S>, that<S>3754</S> the Father<S>3962</S> hath sent<S>649</S> me<S>3165</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the Father<S>3962</S> himself<S>846</S>, which hath sent<S>3992</S> me<S>3165</S>, hath borne witness<S>3140</S> of<S>4012</S> me<S>1700</S>. Ye have<S>191</S> neither<S>3777</S> heard<S>191</S> his<S>846</S> voice<S>5456</S> at any time<S>4455</S>, nor<S>3777</S> seen<S>3708</S> his<S>846</S> shape<S>1491</S>.
And<S>2532</S> ye have<S>2192</S> not<S>3756</S> his<S>846</S> word<S>3056</S> abiding<S>3306</S> in<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S>: for<S>3754</S> whom<S>3739</S> <S>1565</S> he hath sent<S>649</S>, him<S>5129</S> ye<S>5210</S> believe<S>4100</S> not<S>3756</S>.
Search<S>2045</S> the scriptures<S>1124</S>; for<S>3754</S> in<S>1722</S> them<S>846</S> ye<S>5210</S> think<S>1380</S> ye have<S>2192</S> eternal<S>166</S> life<S>2222</S>: and<S>2532</S> they<S>1565</S> are they<S>1526</S> which testify<S>3140</S> of<S>4012</S> me<S>1700</S>.
And<S>2532</S> ye will<S>2309</S> not<S>3756</S> come<S>2064</S> to<S>4314</S> me<S>3165</S>, that<S>2443</S> ye might have<S>2192</S> life<S>2222</S>.
I receive<S>2983</S> not<S>3756</S> honour<S>1391</S> from<S>3844</S> men<S>444</S>.
But<S>235</S> I know<S>1097</S> you<S>5209</S>, that<S>3754</S> ye have<S>2192</S> not<S>3756</S> the love<S>26</S> of God<S>2316</S> in<S>1722</S> you<S>1438</S>.
I am<S>1473</S> come<S>2064</S> in<S>1722</S> my<S>3450</S> Father's<S>3962</S> name<S>3686</S>, and<S>2532</S> ye receive<S>2983</S> me<S>3165</S> not<S>3756</S>: if<S>1437</S> another<S>243</S> shall come<S>2064</S> in<S>1722</S> his own<S>2398</S> name<S>3686</S>, him<S>1565</S> ye will receive<S>2983</S>.
How<S>4459</S> can<S>1410</S> ye<S>5210</S> believe<S>4100</S>, which receive<S>2983</S> honour<S>1391</S> one of another<S>3844</S> <S>240</S>, and<S>2532</S> seek<S>2212</S> not<S>3756</S> the honour<S>1391</S> that cometh from<S>3844</S> God<S>2316</S> only<S>3441</S>?
Do<S>1380</S> not<S>3361</S> think<S>1380</S> that<S>3754</S> I<S>1473</S> will accuse<S>2723</S> you<S>5216</S> to<S>4314</S> the Father<S>3962</S>: there is<S>2076</S> one that accuseth<S>2723</S> you<S>5216</S>, even Moses<S>3475</S>, in<S>1519</S> whom<S>3739</S> ye<S>5210</S> trust<S>1679</S>.
For<S>1063</S> <S>1487</S> had ye believed<S>4100</S> Moses<S>3475</S>, ye would have believed<S>4100</S> <S>302</S> me<S>1698</S>: for<S>1063</S> he<S>1565</S> wrote<S>1125</S> of<S>4012</S> me<S>1700</S>.
But<S>1161</S> if<S>1487</S> ye believe<S>4100</S> not<S>3756</S> his<S>1565</S> writings<S>1121</S>, how<S>4459</S> shall ye believe<S>4100</S> my<S>1699</S> words<S>4487</S>?
